data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 12477, Version Hash: cb279a736d88664e6a0eb25a08413306438dfe97
data.actual_result: Bot users have a 'I'm new to discord, say hi' thing on their server 'mini profile' only intended for users.
data.expected_result: No 'I'm new to discord, say hi' on bot users because you can't say hi to a bot 😉
data.short_description: On new bot users, there is a useless 'I'm new to discord, say hi' when you can't really say hi to a bot.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a bot on the discord bot api page - Click on the bot user and move your cursor to the wumpus. - A little message should pop up saying 'I'm new to discord, say hi!'.
